value.title: Amazon Best Sellers in AI and Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Amazon's most popular books based on sales for AI and Machine Learning.

topItems.title: AI Superpowers: China, Silicon Valley, and the New World Order
topItems.excerpt: Dr. Kai-Fu Lee—one of the world’s most respected experts on AI and China—reveals that China has suddenly caught up to the US at an astonishingly rapid and unexpected pace.

images.title: AI Superpowers: China, Silicon Valley, and the New World Order

topItems.title: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow: Concepts, Tools, and Techniques to Build Intelligent Systems
topItems.excerpt: Through a series of recent breakthroughs, deep learning has boosted the entire field of machine learning. Now, even programmers who know close to nothing about this technology can use simple, efficient tools to implement programs capable of learning from data. This practical book shows you how.

images.title: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow: Concepts, Tools, and Techniques to Build Intelligent Systems

topItems.title: Code: The Hidden Language of Computer Hardware and Software
topItems.excerpt: What do flashlights, the British invasion, black cats, and seesaws have to do with computers? In CODE, they show us the ingenious ways we manipulate language and invent new means of communicating with each other. And through CODE, we see how this ingenuity and our very human compulsion to communicate have driven the technological innovations of the past two centuries. Using everyday objects and familiar language systems such as Braille and Morse code, author Charles Petzold weaves an illuminating narrative for anyone who’s ever wondered about the secret inner life of computers and other smart machines.

images.title: Code: The Hidden Language of Computer Hardware and Software

topItems.title: Human Compatible: Artificial Intelligence and the Problem of Control
topItems.excerpt: A leading artificial intelligence researcher lays out a new approach to AI that will enable us to coexist successfully with increasingly intelligent machines

images.title: Human Compatible: Artificial Intelligence and the Problem of Control
AI Superpowers: China, Silicon Valley, and the New World Order

value.title: Machine Learning Overview
value.excerpt: A collection of short articles and videos to help you get started with machine learning

topItems.title: Machine Learning for Everyone
topItems.excerpt: A long blog post that explains machine learning in simple terms, with real-world examples and lots of visuals.

topItems.title: A visual introduction to machine learning
topItems.excerpt: In machine learning, computers apply statistical learning techniques to automatically identify patterns in data. These techniques can be used to make highly accurate predictions.

topItems.title: A Gentle Guide to Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Machine Learning is a subfield within Artificial Intelligence that builds algorithms that allow computers to learn to perform tasks from data instead of being explicitly programmed.

images.title: A Gentle Guide to Machine Learning

topItems.title: Machine Learning 101 for Dummies like Me
topItems.excerpt: The purpose of this article in the 101 for Dummies like Me series is to simplify the definition and understanding of machine learning.
